title: Sellmymobile.com
details1: Implement Firebase Login Authentication, JWT token, Responsive, React Router Dom, Context Api, React JS, TailwindCSS, Toaster, Model and reactForm Implementation, React Query.
details2: Create Dashboard ,admin panel, user panel, Admin can see, All Users, All Buyers, All Sellers & can manage them.Seller to add a product and my product  & manage Product Features. Buyers can see their own bookings and they can purchase from there.
details3: Node.js, Express.Js, MongoDB, Env, Vercel Deploy,Stripe Payment,(CRUD) Operation, get ,post.
